events.title: Launch of Windows 11
events.description: Microsoft released Windows 11, introducing a new user interface, enhanced performance, and updated productivity tools.

events.title: Colonial Pipeline Ransomware Attack
events.description: A ransomware attack on Colonial Pipeline caused widespread fuel shortages across the eastern United States.

events.title: Facebook Outage
events.description: A major outage affected Facebook and its associated services, including Instagram and WhatsApp, for several hours.

events.title: Google AI LaMDA Announcement
events.description: Google announced LaMDA, a breakthrough in conversational AI technology capable of engaging in natural conversations on various topics.
